entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
